data Router' env a
  • = StaticRouter (Map Text (Router' env a)) [env -> a]
  • | CaptureRouter (Router' (Text, env) a)
  • | CaptureAllRouter (Router' ([Text], env) a)
  • | RawRouter (env -> a)
  • | Choice (Router' env a) (Router' env a)

display_html: type HasServerArrowTypeError a b = (((Text "No instance HasServer (a -> b)." :$$: Text "Maybe you have used '->' instead of ':>' between ") :$$: ShowType a) :$$: Text "and") :$$: ShowType b
name: HasServerArrowTypeError

display_html: type HasServerArrowKindError arr = (Text "Expected something of kind Symbol or *, got: k -> l on the LHS of ':>'." :$$: Text "Maybe you haven't applied enough arguments to") :$$: ShowType arr
name: HasServerArrowKindError
